text: "Halls of Illusions" is a 1997 midwest hip hop song by the American horrorcore band Insane Clown Posse. It is the first single from their fourth studio album The Great Milenko (1997). The song was produced by Insane Clown Posse and Mike Clark. It featured Slash on guitar. The song is about the band's hatred towards child abuse and domestic violence. The song has swearing but is loved by many Juggalos. Category:Insane Clown Posse songs Category:1997 songs
title: Halls of Illusions
